General.Name: NPC Co. Ltd
General.Description: NPC Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic products in South Korea. The company's products include containers, pallets, chairs and desks, recycling bins, sheets, reversetap, and cups. The company was formerly known as National Plastic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NPC Co., Ltd. in March 2010. NPC Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
